about_the_game:
What will it be If you touch the umbrella? What happens when you grab the dog’s nose?

Touch the screen and let’s move back and forth in a relaxing day at the house, town, and the sea! Enjoy the world of “here AND there” by artist Komitsu, filled with plenty of adorable events and exciting events.

*features
・hand-drawn animation by a sign pen
・touchable about 20 points in each landscape
・some happenings are connected to each other
・there is no ending but the sunset
・enjoy the relaxing music

reviews:
